p:
In vitro the cytotoxic potential of hydroethanolic plant extract, 10 mg/mL was dissolved in 20% DMSO (Dimethyl sulfoxide), was determined through hemolytic assay performed by spectrophotometric method against Human erythrocytes.Triton-x-100 as positive control and phosphate buffer saline (PBS) as negative control were used.
25- 26 % age hemolysis was calculated as:
